org.hps.monitoring.plotting

Class MonitoringPlotFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hep.aida.ref.plotter.DummyPlotterFactory
      • hep.aida.ref.plotter.PlotterFactory
        • hep.aida.jfree.plotter.PlotterFactory
          • org.hps.monitoring.plotting.MonitoringPlotFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hep.aida.IPlotterFactory

    public class MonitoringPlotFactory
extends hep.aida.jfree.plotter.PlotterFactory
    This class implements an AIDA IPlotterFactory for the monitoring application. It extends the JFree plotter by putting plots into tabs. Each plotter factory is given its own top-level tab in a root tabbed pane, under which are separate tabs for each plotter. The root pane is static and shared across all plotter factories. The top level component is set externally by the MonitoringApplication before any calls to AIDA are made from Drivers.

      • createStripChart

        public StripChartUpdater createStripChart(String name,
                                          String rangeLabel,
                                          int seriesCount,
                                          String[] seriesNames,
                                          int itemCount,
                                          org.jfree.data.time.RegularTimePeriod timeBase,
                                          ValueProvider valueProvider,
                                          long rangeView)
        This creates a strip chart with full parameter settings, which will automatically update at a certain time interval.
        Parameters:
        name - The title of the chart.
        rangeLabel - The range axis label text.
        seriesCount - The number of series in the data set.
        seriesNames - The names of the series (if non-null the length must match seriesCount).
        itemCount - The maximum number of items in the series.
        timeBase - The time unit for updates.
        valueProvider - The interface for providing the series values.
        rangeView - The view in the domain axis around the current data point (applied to plus and minus).
        Returns:
        The StripChartUpdater for the chart.

      • createStripChart

        public StripChartUpdater createStripChart(String name,
                                          int seriesCount,
                                          org.jfree.data.time.RegularTimePeriod timeBase,
                                          ValueProvider valueProvider)
        Create a strip chart with simple parameter settings.
        Parameters:
        name - The title of the strip chart.
        seriesCount - The number of series in the data set.
        timeBase - The time interval for updating.
        valueProvider - The interface for providing values.
        Returns:
        The StripChartUpdater for the chart.

      • createStripChart

        public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createStripChart(String title,
                                                   String yAxisLabel,
                                                   int maxAge,
                                                   int maxCount,
                                                   int rangeSize)
        Create a strip chart which must be updated manually.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the chart.
        yAxisLabel - The y axis label.
        maxAge - The maximum age of items to keep.
        maxCount - The maximum count of items.
        rangeSize - The size of the data range.
        Returns:
        The strip chart as a JFreeChart.
